items.title: What you should ask a potential employer
items.content_html:
Lobsters What you should ask a potential employer

by JohnCarter@users.lobste.rs (JohnCarter) #practices

So linkedin has been bombarding me with HR fluff pieces about what you should ask candidates, and conversely what candidates should ask potential employers.

I ignored them until my subconscious coughed up the answer.

This is what you should ask any potential employerâ€¦.

What is your null process?

ie. If someone (anyone) spots a trivial obvious customer visible flaw, that literally has a one line fixâ€¦.

What is your process from the defect being spotted until the fix is delivered into the customers hands?

More than anything this will tell you what sort of shop youâ€™re dealing with.

ie. Whether you dealing with a bunch of cowboys or process droids so heavy that nothing can get done.

Article URL: https://lobste.rs/s/jyl8yr/what_you_should_ask_potential_employer
